original_text: And Joshua the son of Nun, and Caleb the son of Jephunneh, which were of them that searched the land, rent their clothes:
korean_text: 그 땅을 정탐한 자 중 눈의 아들 여호수아와 여분네의 아들 갈렙이 자기들의 옷을 찢고

sentences.original_text: And Joshua the son of Nun
and Caleb the son of Jephunneh
which were of them that searched the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅을 정탐한 자 중에 있었던 자들은
